chess.logic.gamelogic

Class CheckingLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.logic.gamelogic.CheckingLogic

  • public class CheckingLogic
extends Object
    This class is responsible for checking if king is checked, checkmated or stalemated in the game given to it as parameter. After checking that it will act according to situation to continue game flow.
    Author:
    sami

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CheckingLogic(GameSituation game)
      Creates a new CheckingLogic-object for given game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkIfChecked(Player player)
      Updates set containing all squares that opponent threatens and then checks if player's king is on one of those.
      boolean checkIfCheckedAndMated(Player player)
      Checks if player is both checked and checkmated.
      boolean checkMate(Player player)
      Checks whether or not player is checkmated in this game.
      boolean stalemate(Player player)
      Returns whether or not chosen player has any legal moves.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • CheckingLogic

        public CheckingLogic(GameSituation game)
        Creates a new CheckingLogic-object for given game.
        Parameters:
        game - game that this checkingLogic will be applied for.

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfCheckedAndMated

        public boolean checkIfCheckedAndMated(Player player)
        Checks if player is both checked and checkmated.
        Parameters:
        player - player whose game situation is being checked
        Returns:
        true if player is both checked and checkmated

      • checkIfChecked

        public boolean checkIfChecked(Player player)
        Updates set containing all squares that opponent threatens and then checks if player's king is on one of those.
        Parameters:
        player - player being checked
        Returns:
        true if player's king is threatened by opposing piece

      • checkMate

        public boolean checkMate(Player player)
        Checks whether or not player is checkmated in this game.
        Parameters:
        player - player who is possibly checkmated.
        Returns:
        true if player is checkmated. Else false.

      • stalemate

        public boolean stalemate(Player player)
        Returns whether or not chosen player has any legal moves.
        Parameters:
        player - chosen player
        Returns:
        true player has no legal moves otherwise false.
